adrFormatAddress: 427 Fort Washington Ave #2h, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: Looking for a caring, compassionate place for your child?  Look no further!  My children attended Gardens for over three years, and they had an incredibly positive experience throughout all periods of their lives (pandemic included).  The staff at Gardens is loving, communicative, flexible, and understanding, and our children have developed into social, curious, and kind little beings because of their time at Gardens.

originalText.text: This daycare has always been awesome, so happy to see its still open! My 2 kids went here years ago for about 3 years and they loved going to daycare. The workers were nice and compassionate. They really have a way with children. You can tell the kids were taken well care off. And the open communication with the owner of the daycare was something I really appreciated. As a first time mom, I felt confident in living my babies with her. The place is clean! And she actually helped potty train my daughter and son. Honestly I haven't found a daycare as awesome as this one. Sadly we moved and no longer could use her, because of the long commute. I highly highly recommend this daycare!!

originalText.text:
Our little guy has been going to Gardens for almost two years now and he loves it. He can't wait to get inside and play with his friends, read fun books and learn about all the things he sees around him (the mail, the weather, the change of seasons).

My wife and I have felt really comfortable each day dropping him off and picking him up knowing that the staff there cares about him and every other little person in there. Thank you Gardens for making the infant and toddler years a special time!

text.text:

My wife and I have felt really comfortable each day dropping him off and picking him up knowing that the staff there cares about him and every other little person in there. Thank you Gardens for making the infant and toddler years a special time!

originalText.text: My daughter had a great experience during her year at Gardens. What drew me to it initially was the bright space - clean, bright, and sunny - as well as the meals- hot, healthy mostly nonprocessed foods that were different from the usual packaged kid snacks at other daycares. Gardens provided both structured learning and activities, as well as a lot of fun free play time. The staff was wonderful - incredibly attentive, caring, and responsive to concerns, and I could tell they really cared about my child. She loved them right back, rushing in every morning sometimes without even saying goodbye to me :) Now that we have left the neighborhood, the thing we miss most of all is definitely Gardens. We wish we could take them with us!

originalText.text:
Our little one has been going to Gardens for almost two years and absolutely loves it. We have watched him thrive with Miss Lissette and her team. He loves running into the daycare in the morning and seeing his favorite teachers and little buddies. He’s made some wonderful connections at such a young age and it’s really nice as parents to see.

Miss Lissette and her team are very attentive with the children. They know each child so well and work with you to navigate all the changes that happen the first few years of a person’s life. We are grateful we found Gardens when we did.
